li.a: High School Apprenticeship and Job Shadow Program

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_slider et_pb_slider_0 et_pb_slider_fullwidth_off et_slider_auto et_slider_speed_7000

div.p: Please see COVID-19 Page for additional information and School updates.

p.strong: FREE Breakfast & Lunch for ALL Victory Students & Siblings beginning April 13!

div.p: Don’t forget that beginning Monday, April 13, FREE, cold breakfast and lunch combo meals for ALL Victory students and their siblings, ages 1-18, will be available daily for curbside pickup at Victory between 10:30 am –Noon while supplies last. Students and siblings do NOT need to be present in order for parents to pick up their meals. Please remember meals are to be taken and not consumed on site. Thank you.

p.strong: ¡Desayuno y almuerzo GRATUITOS para TODOS los estudiantes y hermanos Victory a partir del 13 de abril!

div.p: No olvide que a partir del lunes 13 de abril, las comidas combinadas GRATUITAS para el desayuno y el almuerzo fríos para TODOS los estudiantes de Victory y sus hermanos, de 1 a 18 años, estarán disponibles todos los días para que los recojan en la acera en Victory entre las 10:30 a. M. último. Los estudiantes y hermanos NO necesitan estar presentes para que los padres puedan recoger sus comidas. Recuerde que las comidas deben tomarse y no consumirse en el sitio. Gracias.
Victory Charter closed March 17-April 10 for K-8; High school students to attend classes online March 17-25.
Victory Charter cerró del 17 de marzo al 10 de abril para K-8; estudiantes de secundaria asistirán a clases en línea del 17 al 25 de marzo.
See attached Parent Letter. Thank you!

1st-3rd Grade- Thursday, August 6
from 11:30-12:30 PM
Kindergarten- Friday, August 7
from 11:30-12:30 PM

AmazonSmile

div.div: Congratulations to the Victory Charter High School Academic Decathlon team for winning a 2018 Regional State Championship in the small school division!

p.span: ***Victory will be switching to a new lunch software. There will be a New Pay for Student Meals Online. You can set up your account as early as 1/16/2020, but will not be able to use it until January 23rd. We will ask that you don’t add money the old ezschoolpay after that date. Any money left on the ezschoolpay will be transferred on January 22nd.***

div.p:
Lanyard Sales
Victory Viper school lanyards are for sale in the
front office for $2.00 each.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: On behalf of the teachers and staff of Victory Charter School, we welcome you! Victory Charter School, which opened in 2004, is a public charter school that employs the Harbor School Method. Victory has a longstanding history of being an institution that offers a challenging academic program and that has high personal character expectations. Beyond our outstanding K-8 program which ranks among the top in the state of Idaho for student achievement, our high school program offers dozens of college credits in conjunction with local colleges and universities, community service and apprenticeship programs, an award winning music department, and an array of extra-curricular programs. We are excited for you to be a part of our school’s community!

Dr. Marianne Saunders & Mrs. Tera Luce
Co-Administrators
Victory Charter School is grounded in the belief that when there is low threat and content is highly challenging, accelerated learning takes place.
Victory Charter School’s mission is to develop students who are competent, confident, productive and responsible young adults who possess the habits, skills and attitudes to succeed in life.
The Harbor Method is a whole school approach designed to educate children to be capable and caring graduates ready for the next level of their education. Why Harbor Method?
